phrases: Even though it is easy to say I love you
when you stand in front of me
my personality stands up and gets in my way.
I can usually pull through with my assertiveness
that is just how I am.
But no matter how hard I try, I cannot break the wall that is between us.
I want you to realise my feelings.
So I always send a gaze
of I really love you your way
After meeting you, I finally realised
that I am really clumsy when it comes to love.
The scars from love that I would almost forgotten
have started to ache all of a sudden.
Someday, like how I normally would...
I must say I love you, or else I will become even weaker.
Now it is Christmas, there are lots of smiles
I have given you a party night
Now it is Christmas, there are lots of wishes
I promise you a Holy, Holy, Night
This year's Christmas is a bit special
Even though it is not a white Christmas
It is glittering and shining, everyone is happy
It is flickering and twinkling, everyone is dreaming
Now it is Christmas, there are lots of smiles
I have given you a party night
Now it is Christmas, there are lots of wishes
I promise you a Holy, Holy, Night
lone ly christ mas ja tsu ma ra na i
Now it is Christmas, there are lots of smiles
I have given you a party night
Now it is Christmas, there are lots of wishes
I promise you a Holy, Holy, Night
This year's Christmas is surely special
It is swaying and flickering, everyone is holding hands
It is sparkling and twinkling, everyone is looking up at the stars
Now it is Christmas, there are lots of smiles
I have given you a party night
Now it is Christmas, there are lots of wishes
I promise you a Holy, Holy, Night
Your call can not be connected at the moment.
Please leave a message after the beep.
I will call you back later.
You have to come no matter what, okay?
Why did you do that out of the blue?!
You will understand when you open it.
I have to get ready, so I will come over in half an hour.
Ryuu-chan, come over here and check her out!
That is good, it is the perfect size.
I-Is it okay for me to borrow these clothes from you?
The name R. Aisaka is sown inside!
Is not this is your father's?
He just sort of left it because it did not fit him, so it is okay.
If you do not want it, I will just throw it away.
These small chores really suit you.
You were the one who told me to take it.
How can you say something like that when you cannot even say your name?
Magical Girl Ya-chan will cast some magic on you two!
Now do not go too wild.
this will smell really good mixed in with your scent.
A long time ago, when I ran away from home,
I took a few valuable things with me.
That means this is my grandfather's.
Hey, you will a catch a cold like this.
Write down your name and class when you enter!
Wow, there are a lot of people.
There is only one important thing...
There is something you have to do tonight, get it?
So the reason you are not coming to the party is because you have a date.
I am going to a course for single women about buying real estate.
Yeah, I am going to buy an apartment.
Well, that is because women who date on Christmas Eve are far from being prepared.
When you find something you want, you have to get it right away!
Anyway, I need to worry about buying an apartment.
Everyone, try to stay out of trouble!
Thank goodness the Christmas tree was fixed.
Your grades went up too, so I am really happy.
I knew you would be rewarded for all the effort you put in.
Yeah, and you will definitely get what you want as well!
A fantastic single life is waiting for you!
I would like to thank you all for coming out tonight for this party, planned by the God of Broken Hearts!
We went through a lot of trouble,
but regardless, this Christmas party is about to begin.
Stop, we will lose if you complain.
Everyone, I truly appreciate your cooperation.
I want you all to have a wonderful time tonight!
We are going to celebrate Christmas Eve, so...
No, it is just normal chicken.
Nanako, they have cake over there!
Kihara in hot pants and Nanako-san in an innocent one piece are really hot.
Speaking of which, why is everyone all dressed up?
Keep focused while you are walking.
The floor will get sticky if syrup spills on it!
I was wondering why I did not see you.
Well, I could not stand how the drinks were being handled, so...
By the way, I am surprised you have such an expensive suit!
Is not that chicken grease on your hands?!
I have not seen Ami-chan yet!
I think I caught a glimpse of her.
He is right, where did she go?
but I am all in for Ami-chan.
When exactly did they practise for this?
I will call you back later.
You have to come no matter what, okay?
Ami-chan and Taiga were both hot, but still cute as well!
How long are you planning to stay there?
It was like a dream come true!
I am sure it was different than your dreams.
Look, hot, but still cute, and so on, are basically the same thing.
Hey, Maruo, what are you doing?
Do you think I am hot, but still cute?
Give me some fruit punch please.
Yeah, somehow it turned out like this.
When did you practise for it?
If it was not kept a secret, it would not have been a surprise, right?
Yeah, I was totally caught off guard.
By the way, where is Taiga?
I could tell she tried her best,
so I wanted to give her some fruit punch as a reward.
She is going to Minori-chan's place.
She said she was going to get Minori to come here and then go home.
It was something about welcoming Santa, I think.
I do not know, but maybe there is something she would rather not see.
That is why I gave you some advice.
I think you should stop playing this childish game of house.
Why do you have to pretend to be daddy?
He did not even listen to me back then.
To give everyone a happy and joyful Christmas,
I am prepared to take off one or two pieces of clothing, or even take it all off.
I want to be part of the happy, glittering scene on Christmas Eve,
Takasu, can you get me some fruit punch?
I am going out for a bit.
Ryuuji is waiting for you to come.
He said he will not leave until he sees you.
He is even prepared to live at school.
but it is not that you do not like him, right?
As I thought, it does not work if I am only good around Christmas.
That is why I will be alone this year.
I will also be alone next year...
I will never have someone to rely on,
and I will be all alone.
It is coming from my bedroom.
I knew this would be the best!
D-Do not take it off, you idiot!
So tell me, where did you get this?
I borrowed it from a guy who was wearing it.
Oh, what did you do with your suit?
Well, I traded it with the guy who was wearing this.
Oh, I will definitely get it back later.
You took it off when it was just about to begin.
Even though I planned everything for you...
Even though you had the chance to meet Minorin!
What do you mean by stupid?
Did not I tell you to believe in Angel Taiga?
Minorin is on her way to the party.
Come on, you can still make it if you hurry.
I have already changed my clothes,
and I do not want to leave you by yourself.
A fake Santa and faking being good...
Oh, and of course, I am looking forward to tomorrow.
If by some chance things go well with Minorin,
tomorrow's Christmas meal will be on me!
No, we cannot have chicken because of Inko-chan.
Then, it will just be a beef and rice bowl.
If you are not there at that party, it will mean I lied to Minorin, right?
Santa came already, so I have to be good until the end of the year!
Getting Minorin to go to the party is my real Christmas present for you.
I forgot to give this back to him.
I was always relying on Ryuuji.
Minorin will definitely fall for Ryuuji,
In other words, they both like each other.
Then, I will not be able to...
I will not be able to walk by his side.
I did not bring my cell phone,
and my present is still in the pocket of the suit.
It is a great bear, right?
I am sorry, but let me speak first.
when we were at Amin's villa during the summer,
we had a talk one night about weird things?
It was about UFOs and ghosts...
I really think I should not see them.
I think it would be best not to see them.
I have been thinking about it a lot recently, and this is what I decided.
I wanted to tell you that.
That is why I am here.
I am sorry for just saying what I wanted to say.
Whenever I close my eyes, I -
I am already hearing her usual cheerful voice.
